# EzChat Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
EzChat is a video chatroom platform where usernames are chatrooms. Built with Next.js 14, Convex, and WebRTC.

## Current Progress
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project structure
- [ ] Set up Convex backend and schema
- [ ] Configure authentication with Clerk
- [ ] Build homepage with chatroom directory
- [ ] Build chatroom page with WebRTC video
- [ ] Implement role-based permissions system
- [ ] Create README documentation

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- ShadCN UI + TailwindCSS
- GSAP for animations
- Clerk for authentication
- Convex for backend/database
- polar.sh for billing
- WebRTC for video chat
